hero.title: A small team, real hands, stories you can wear.
hero.description: This is not a showroom. It is a guided craft session where your ring becomes part of your travel memory.

approach.title: Less performance, more substance
approach.paragraphOne: The Ring Experience was built for people who want to remember a moment, not just purchase an object.
approach.paragraphTwo: Our role is simple: to turn shared time into a meaningful piece made by your own hands.

packagesSection.heading: Choose the pace of your experience
packagesSection.description: Same artisanal core, different formats based on time and level of personalization.

packages.name: Essential
packages.description: Guided session with material introduction, core techniques, and final ring finishing.

packages.name: Couple Ritual
packages.description: A complete couple format with shared design choices, engraving options, and dedicated assistance.

packages.name: Signature
packages.description: Extended one-to-one direction with premium materials and deeper customization.
